Package com.freshbourne.io

Interface Summary
BufferPoolManager  
ComplexPage  
DataPage<T> Pages implementing this interface use the provided buffer to store data.
MustBeOpened This interface should be implemented to avoid throwing Exceptions in the constructor.
MustInitializeOrLoad Classes should not have too complex logic in the constructor.
PageManager<T> Classes implementing this interface provide controlled access to pages.
ResourceManager ResourceManager reads and writes RawPage from and to a resource.
 

Class Summary
BufferPoolManagerImpl provides access to pages.
DataPageManager<T>  
DynamicDataPage<T> Wraps around a byte[] and can hold values of variable serialized length.
FileResourceManager Provides access to Pages stored in a RandomAccessFile.
IOModule  
PagePointer This object points to a byte in a page
RawPage This class wraps a byte array and usually has an id and a source Long is chosen as id, although in most scenarios Integer should be sufficient.
ResourceHeader organizes the underlying byte[] like this: (int) TOTAL_NUM_OF_PAGES_OVER_ALL_HEADER_PAGES (this only in first headerpage) | (int) NUMBER_OF_ADITIONAL_HEADER_PAGES | virtual_page_id 1 | virtual_page_id 2 | ..
 

Exception Summary
DuplicatePageIdException  
InvalidPageException  
NoSpaceException  
PageNotFoundException  
WrongPageSizeException
